identity.name: NOOZ.NEWS
identity.core_philosophy: Raw Data. Zero Noise. High Voltage.

usage_rules.headings: Uppercase, tight tracking (-0.02em). Use for article titles and section headers.
usage_rules.body: High legibility. Use for summaries and long-form content.
usage_rules.mono: Use for ALL metadata: timestamps, read times, tags, source names, and system status.
usage_rules.hero: Massive scale (text-6xl+), leading-none, potentially outlined text.

rules.gradients: FORBIDDEN. Use solid colors or noise textures only.
rules.transparency: Minimal. Use solid backgrounds to prevent visual bleeding. Glassmorphism is BANNED.
rules.hover_states: Hard contrast shift. Example: Black text on Green background.

grid_system.feed: Bento-style masonry. Mix of col-span-1, col-span-2, and row-span-2 cards.
grid_system.spacing: Dense. gap-4 or gap-6. Padding p-6 inside cards.

header.elements: Monospace ticker, system status (ONLINE/OFFLINE), raw text links.

sidebar.style: Fixed, border-r border-border. Hidden on mobile, w-64 on desktop.
sidebar.content: Trending topics, source filter list (checkboxes), ad placements.

cards.style: Flat, sharp edges (rounded-none or rounded-sm). 1px border.
cards.interaction: Hover: Border color becomes Primary (#00FF94). Image turns from grayscale to color.
content_structure: Footer (Read Time vs Original Time, Share Icon)

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-white hover:text-black rounded-none uppercase font-mono text-sm tracking-wider px-6 py-3 transition-colors duration-75
buttons.secondary: border border-border bg-transparent hover:border-primary hover:text-primary rounded-none uppercase font-mono text-sm px-6 py-3

tags.style: border border-border px-2 py-1 text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-secondary

inputs.style: bg-black border border-border rounded-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary focus:border-primary placeholder:text-muted-foreground font-mono

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay on the background to kill the digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.borders: The 'Grid Border' look. Elements should look like they are part of a technical schematic.
visual_enhancers.images: Default to Grayscale (filter: grayscale(100%)). Hover reveals full color. This reduces visual noise in the feed.
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Regular or Bold weight). Sharp angles preferred.

motion.loading: Skeleton loaders with a 'scanning' line effect (linear-gradient animation).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #E5E5E5 or #FFFFFF on dark backgrounds. Primary color (#00FF94) is for accents/buttons, ensure black text on top of it.

setup: Install fonts: Space Grotesk, Manrope, JetBrains Mono via Google Fonts.
Configure Tailwind colors to match the palette exactly.
Set default border radius to 0px or 2px (sm).
Create a 'Noise' component for the background texture.
critical_reminders: DO NOT use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Keep it sharp.
DO NOT use drop-shadow-lg. Use borders for separation.
Ensure the 'Read Time' comparison is prominent (e.g., 'AI: 1m vs Orig: 8m').
Use the 'Signal Green' (#00FF94) sparingly. It is high voltage.

universal_guidelines.anti_slop: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
universal_guidelines.depth: Use z-index and borders, not shadows.
universal_guidelines.interaction: Every click must feel responsive. Use active states.
universal_guidelines.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
